title: stock-level.request
description: Request for stock level of items from vendor's api

accountId.description: The main account identifier for the supplier

customIdentifierFields.description:
A collection of identifiers specific to the Vendor.
These were either previously returned by the vendor, or configured by the user based on vendor-specific inputs

callbackData.description: Generic data that is specified by the previous request's CallbackInfo

branchId.description: The identifier for the branch to get the stock level for

items.description: List of items to get the stock level for

shippingAddress.description: Shipping address to use for availability checks. Comes from an address selected on a purchase order.

isVendorCounterPickup.description:
If true, the vendor counter pickup option was selected.
This signifies a will call order or vendor counter pickup from a specific branch.

ItemStockLevelRequestDto.description: Item request object to specify the item and quantity for the pricing request

itemId.description: Item's identifier in the vendor's system

quantity.description: Quantity of the item for the request
